statements.english: to give her a big surprise

statements.chinese: 我想要给她一个大惊喜
statements.english: I want to give her a big surprise
you can give me some advice

statements.chinese: 你可以给我一些建议吗？

statements.chinese: 我希望你可以给我一些建议
statements.english: I hope you can give me some advice
you can give me a hand
can you give me a hand

statements.chinese: 我希望你可以给我帮把手
statements.english: I hope you can give me a hand
you can hand me the knife

statements.chinese: 你可以递给我那把刀吗?
statements.english: can you hand me the knife

statements.chinese: 你可以（礼貌版）递给我那把刀吗？
statements.english: could you hand me the knife
to read her a bedtime story

statements.chinese: 我的女儿想要我读给她一个睡前故事
statements.english: my daughter wants me to read her a bedtime story

statements.chinese: 你不要忘记打电话给我
statements.english: you don't forget to call me

statements.chinese: 不要忘记打电话给我当你到达那里的时候
statements.english: don't forget to call me when you get there
to buy her a new dress

statements.english: I bought my daughter a new dress

statements.chinese: 买给我的女儿一个生日礼物

statements.english: I will buy my daughter a birthday gift

statements.chinese: 下个月我将会买给我女儿一个生日礼物
statements.english: I will buy my daughter a birthday gift next month

statements.english: I make myself a cup of coffee every morning

statements.chinese: 你可以做给她一杯咖啡吗？

I want to make her happy

statements.chinese: 明天是小月亮的生日而且我想要让她开心
